marklogic.body:
just like i predicted, come 2013 he'll be in talks with WWE for HOF and/or match at Wrestlemania 29.
if by some fluke of nature this was to actually happen, WWE show do like a retro Attitude vs PG Era themed Wrestlemania.
Brock Lerner vs Randy Orton Batista vs Mason Ryan(just because they are clones) Sting vs Taker New Age Outlaws vs some team WWE puts together for 2 seconds Stone Cold vs CM Punk Rock vs Cena 2
